name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"28a715b6-0822-4ec9-ad0e-0b982f9b5138","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Class Documentation: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ChangeManager","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d29bf70a-790b-4807-bd61-f9c9c5dbd6bd","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ChangeManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" class is a high-level orchestrator designed to track and manage deferred value-flow updates. In static analysis, particularly when dealing with control-flow structures like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"else","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"while","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the analyzer often discovers changes to a variable's state that should only be applied or merged once the entire block is processed.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d989a607-4f65-4408-aac3-57f27f3ac3ea","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This class provides a scoped storage mechanism to hold these ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ChangeItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" records until they are ready to be integrated into the global model.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"23611345-2a3b-45b5-90ea-94d68a8bc7cb","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"7d56d30c-d7be-4f57-b68f-aaa2970e0c56","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Attributes","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0e14d651-ce6a-4047-93e6-6c75139a8fc6","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"changes","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"dict","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"): The primary storage for deferred updates. It is organized as a nested dictionary: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"self.changes[scope_namespace][variable_name] = ChangeItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". This ensures that changes are kept separate based on their functional or block-level scope.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"aa31e766-713b-4a7c-aa57-5149b2fc5553","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"95f5db09-9c5b-48a7-bb1f-8b451d7c4c13","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Methods","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6374be49-f482-4462-a432-a3bc167dfe05","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"__init__()
","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Initializes a fresh ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ChangeManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" with an empty ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"changes","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" registry.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ef72b87d-8adb-4484-93c0-cd8df4943b6b","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"getChange(ns)
","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Retrieves the dictionary of changes for a specific namespace.","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"eeea2b26-0b9c-4cc2-a0e8-3cf0aed19cad","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"ns","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The namespace string (e.g., a function or class path).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"294d64fa-e2f0-4178-9b0a-ec0030b037c9","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Internal Logic","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":": If the namespace does not yet exist in the registry, the method automatically creates an empty entry for it and returns that. This "get-or-create" pattern ensures the manager is always ready to receive data for new scopes.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"03ec96c5-b07f-4657-8f85-f4055c6f4bd4","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"addChange(ns, name, row, values, if_union=False)
","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Registers a new change for a specific variable within a namespace.","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"549502cc-4b42-481b-bd4f-d8f4f6570aae","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It checks if the variable ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"name","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" already has an existing ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ChangeItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" in that namespace.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2ab7099d-9b5d-476a-a8c8-42dd96b3efcd","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If it does, it calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"addPoint","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" on that item.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7dc0940c-3e3d-4c2f-b823-5fd776c49b3b","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If it doesn't, it creates a new ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ChangeItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and stores it.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"802a496d-ccdc-46af-84de-92276985b7d6","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"e3b000b3-cfa0-4592-b2d7-db3dbe573111","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Usage Example","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"37559f80-4482-4fef-ab6a-67e148aec712","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ChangeManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is essential for handling branching logic, such as a variable being updated inside an ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" statement.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"de57fbfd-6edd-4c17-ac39-3572bd1232b1","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"# 1. Setup the manager
cm = ChangeManager()

# 2. Inside an 'if' block in the 'process_data' function:
# We find that at line 20, 'status' becomes 'VALID'
cm.addChange(
    ns="app.logic.process_data", 
    name="status", 
    row=20, 
    values="VALID", 
    if_union=True
)

# 3. Later, retrieve all changes for that specific function scope
function_changes = cm.getChange("app.logic.process_data")

for var_name, change_item in function_changes.items():
    print(f"Variable '{var_name}' had changes recorded.")
    # The analyzer can now merge these points into the global symbol table","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3e0a20fc-e4a4-4450-bc55-11703924eee7","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Insights","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d3f1a7b3-0be5-4e0b-8597-bb06c89043c4","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Deferred Execution","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": This class prevents the analyzer from making "premature" updates to the global state. By holding changes in the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ChangeManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the engine can wait until it has seen all branches of a condition before deciding how to merge the final values.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0a74ffbc-417b-4f87-8dbe-63a4351570c3","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scoped Organization","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": By partitioning changes by namespace (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ns","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), it allows Jarvis to handle recursion and nested function calls without different scopes overwriting each other's tracked changes.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"442a2e74-1e6b-4b2c-be90-13eaa6d87554","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Automatic Initialization","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"getChange","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" implementation simplifies usage throughout the system by removing the need for "if namespace exists" checks at the call site.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"19bbfeb5-ccad-423d-860d-106c3461d3cc","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
